org.academiadecodigo.simplegraphics.pictures

Class Picture

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.academiadecodigo.simplegraphics.pictures.Picture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Movable, Shape

    public class Picture
extends java.lang.Object
implements Shape, Movable
    A picture from an image file.
